model.arena.entities.shoot

Interface ShootManager


  • public interface ShootManager
    Another example of Strategy Pattern. The implementation of this interface determinate the shoot of the entity.
    Author:
    josephgiovanelli

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Dimension BULLET_DIMENSION
      The default dimension of the bullet.
      static int BULLET_OFFSET
      The default distance of the bullet from the entity shooter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      If the entity can shoot, then shoot.
      boolean haveShooted()
      Get if the entity has shouted or not.
      boolean isOnShoot()
      Get if the entity is shooting or not.

        Parameters:
        code - : the father code.
